subject: Extended CFP( March 30, 2013):: EBW2013- Thailand-IEEE
from: The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications <donotreply@dcmrf.net>
body:
CALL FOR PAPERS AND PARTICIPATION -+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+ Submission Deadline: March 30, 2013 E-Technologies and Business on the Web (EBW2013) University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce, Bangkok, Thailand May 7-9, 2013 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/ebw2013/ The EBW2013 is technically co-sponsored by IEEE Thailand Section. All papers will be submitted to IEEE for potential inclusion to IEEE Xplore. ======================================================================== The proposed conference on the above theme will be held at University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce, Bangkok, Thailand, From May 7-9, 2013 which aims to enable researchers build connections between different digital applications. The conference welcomes papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics: <-+-+-+-> E-Learning <-+-+-+-> E-government <-+-+-+-> Soft Computing Techniques <-+-+-+-> Computational Intelligence <-+-+-+-> Marketing on the Web <-+-+-+-> Internet payment systems <-+-+-+-> Business-oriented <-+-+-+-> Semantic Web, Ontologies <-+-+-+-> Digital Enterprises <-+-+-+-> E-business applications <-+-+-+-> E-Commerce in developing countries <-+-+-+-> Supply chain management <-+-+-+-> E-Commerce Strategy Implementation <-+-+-+-> E-Commerce Technology <-+-+-+-> E-tailing and multi-channel selling <-+-+-+-> Web Applications <-+-+-+-> Network Security <-+-+-+-> Global E-Commerce <-+-+-+-> Confidentiality Protection <-+-+-+-> Critical Infrastructure Management <-+-+-+-> Critical Computing and Storage <-+-+-+-> Data Mining <-+-+-+-> Barriers to E-Business Adoption <-+-+-+-> E->Services <-+-+-+-> Cryptography for enabling E-Commerce <-+-+-+-> E-Logistics <-+-+-+-> Cryptography and Data Protection <-+-+-+-> Sensor Networks and Social Sensing <-+-+-+-> Fuzzy and Neural Network Systems <-+-+-+-> Distributed and Parallel Applications <-+-+-+-> Anti-cyberterrorism <-+-+-+-> XML-Based Languages <-+-+-+-> E-Commerce <-+-+-+-> Web advertising and Web Publishing <-+-+-+-> Mobile Commerce <-+-+-+-> E-Business Applications and Software <-+-+-+-> E-Communities <-+-+-+-> Consumer-oriented E-Commerce <-+-+-+-> The latest trends in web services <-+-+-+-> M-commerce and pervasive computing <-+-+-+-> Co-production in e-commerce service <-+-+-+-> Economics issues of e-commerce <-+-+-+-> Applications of e-commerce service <-+-+-+-> E-commerce payment systems <-+-+-+-> Digital Management products <-+-+-+-> Digital Innovation Management <-+-+-+-> Digital Economy <-+-+-+-> Business Technology Intelligence <-+-+-+-> IT Management <-+-+-+-> Consumer Electronics <-+-+-+-> E-Business <-+-+-+-> Digital Libraries <-+-+-+-> Digital Data Mining <-+-+-+-> Customer relationship management <-+-+-+-> Evolution of e-commerce <-+-+-+-> E-commerce, e-business strategies <-+-+-+-> E-commerce business models <-+-+-+-> Production of knowledge economy <-+-+-+-> Collaborative commerce <-+-+-+-> E-commerce technology adoption <-+-+-+-> Practices and cases in e-commerce <-+-+-+-> Future development of e-business <-+-+-+-> Cryptography for enabling e-commerce <-+-+-+-> Digital economics, and digital content <-+-+-+-> Trust or security for e-Commerce <-+-+-+-> Data mining and business intelligence <-+-+-+-> EDI and the Internet Researchers are encouraged to submit their work electronically. All papers will be fully refereed by a minimum of two specialized referees. Before final acceptance, all referees comments must be considered. Important Dates ============== Submission Date : March 30, 2013 Notification of acceptance: April 20, 2013 Camera Ready submission : April 30, 2013 Registration : April 30, 2013 Conference dates : May 7-9, 2013 Inquiries can be forwarded to: -+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+ Jackie Blanco The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC) E-mail: th@sdiwc.net www.sdiwc.net ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b CALL FOR PAPERS AND PARTICIPATION
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
Submission Deadline: March 30, 2013
E-Technologies and Business on the Web (EBW2013)
University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce, Bangkok, Thailand
May 7-9, 2013
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/ebw2013/

The EBW2013 is technically co-sponsored by IEEE Thailand Section.
All papers will be submitted to IEEE for potential inclusion to IEEE Xplore.
========================================================================

The proposed conference on the above theme will be held at University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce, Bangkok, Thailand, From May 7-9, 2013 which aims to enable researchers build connections between different digital applications.

The conference welcomes papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics:


<-+-+-+-> E-Learning
<-+-+-+-> E-government
<-+-+-+-> Soft Computing Techniques
<-+-+-+-> Computational Intelligence
<-+-+-+-> Marketing on the Web
<-+-+-+-> Internet payment systems
<-+-+-+-> Business-oriented
<-+-+-+-> Semantic Web, Ontologies
<-+-+-+-> Digital Enterprises
<-+-+-+-> E-business applications
<-+-+-+-> E-Commerce in developing countries
<-+-+-+-> Supply chain management
<-+-+-+-> E-Commerce Strategy Implementation
<-+-+-+-> E-Commerce Technology
<-+-+-+-> E-tailing and multi-channel selling
<-+-+-+-> Web Applications
<-+-+-+-> Network Security
<-+-+-+-> Global E-Commerce
<-+-+-+-> Confidentiality Protection
<-+-+-+-> Critical Infrastructure Management
<-+-+-+-> Critical Computing and Storage
<-+-+-+-> Data Mining
<-+-+-+-> Barriers to E-Business Adoption
<-+-+-+-> E->Services
<-+-+-+-> Cryptography for enabling E-Commerce
<-+-+-+-> E-Logistics
<-+-+-+-> Cryptography and Data Protection
<-+-+-+-> Sensor Networks and Social Sensing
<-+-+-+-> Fuzzy and Neural Network Systems
<-+-+-+-> Distributed and Parallel Applications
<-+-+-+-> Anti-cyberterrorism
<-+-+-+-> XML-Based Languages
<-+-+-+-> E-Commerce
<-+-+-+-> Web advertising and Web Publishing
<-+-+-+-> Mobile Commerce
<-+-+-+-> E-Business Applications and Software
<-+-+-+-> E-Communities
<-+-+-+-> Consumer-oriented E-Commerce
<-+-+-+-> The latest trends in web services
<-+-+-+-> M-commerce and pervasive computing
<-+-+-+-> Co-production in e-commerce service
<-+-+-+-> Economics issues of e-commerce
<-+-+-+-> Applications of e-commerce service
<-+-+-+-> E-commerce payment systems
<-+-+-+-> Digital Management products
<-+-+-+-> Digital Innovation Management
<-+-+-+-> Digital Economy
<-+-+-+-> Business Technology Intelligence
<-+-+-+-> IT Management
<-+-+-+-> Consumer Electronics
<-+-+-+-> E-Business
<-+-+-+-> Digital Libraries
<-+-+-+-> Digital Data Mining
<-+-+-+-> Customer relationship management
<-+-+-+-> Evolution of e-commerce
<-+-+-+-> E-commerce, e-business strategies
<-+-+-+-> E-commerce business models
<-+-+-+-> Production of knowledge economy
<-+-+-+-> Collaborative commerce
<-+-+-+-> E-commerce technology adoption
<-+-+-+-> Practices and cases in e-commerce
<-+-+-+-> Future development of e-business
<-+-+-+-> Cryptography for enabling e-commerce
<-+-+-+-> Digital economics, and digital content
<-+-+-+-> Trust or security for e-Commerce
<-+-+-+-> Data mining and business intelligence
<-+-+-+-> EDI and the Internet

Researchers are encouraged to submit their work electronically. All papers will be fully refereed by a minimum of two specialized referees. Before final acceptance, all referees comments must be considered.

Important Dates
==============

Submission Date : March 30, 2013
Notification of acceptance: April 20, 2013
Camera Ready submission : April 30, 2013
Registration : April 30, 2013
Conference dates : May 7-9, 2013

Inquiries can be forwarded to:
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
Jackie Blanco
The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC)
E-mail: th@sdiwc.net
www.sdiwc.net
